short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple Google Chrome extension for logging the list of WordPress plugins to dev console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple Google Chrome extension for Logging the list of WordPress plugins to dev console in order to see them all in a clean, minimal interface. IMPORTANT! The plugin must be run on the WordPress admin plugins subpage to see the plugins list on the console.
